english.segment1: Take hold your fate in your hands. Your payment, in time, will demand. With fruit thats forbidden, we eat then we die. and we cant survive
english.segment2: When evil rears its head. its life and death. Like David sowed his seed. and his family bled
english.segment3: Consequence comes likes a thief. So quick that it defies belief. Beware the curse it will pass to your seed. with dirty deeds
english.segment4: You tried to tempt your fate. turns out its your mistake. you took what wasnt yours to take now. didnt you?. didnt you?
english.segment5: You only have one chance. Dont take it light. You only have one chance. so get it right
english.segment6: Dont take it light. So get it right
